thread.title: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'
thread.title_full: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'

title: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'
text: > Entertainment NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas' In this Dec. 13, 1978 file photo, police cordon off an area around a stolen black van discovered in the Brooklyn borough of New York. Police suspect the van was used by thieves who escaped with more than $6 million in cash and jewels from a John F. Kennedy International Airport hangar. Vincent Asaro will stand trial in October 2015 for his part in the heist that was immortalized in the Martin Scorsese film "Goodfellas." (AP Photo/Ken Murray, File)
